publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6123 Rob Gibson: Congratulations to Ross County FCâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the players, coaches and management of Ross County FC on their scintillating 2-0 victory over Celtic FC in the semi-final of the Active Nation Scottish Cup on 10 April 2010; applauds the 7,000 or so fans from across the Highlands and Islands and beyond who endured an extremely early start to make it to Hampden for 12.15 to support the team; considers the exceptional performance and result from County a great advert for football in the Highlands and Islands as well as for the First Division and Scotland, and wishes all those connected with the club the best of luck against Dundee United FC in the final at Hampden and for the rest of the season. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Jamie Stone*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie McGrigor*, Brian Adam*, Ian McKee*
S3M-6123 Congratulations to Ross County FC (lodged on 12 April 2010) Robin Harper*, Liam McArthur*
S3M-6123 Congratulations to Ross County FC (lodged on 12 April 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Dave Thompson*, Willie Coffey*, Gil Paterson*
